question:
Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to the swimming pool in the community ahead. At the current location, if the swimming pool in the residential area ahead is not within your field of view, what is the most relevant object in your field of view, and where is this object?  
choose:  
A. I see the swimming pool in the residential area ahead.  
B. I cannot see the swimming pool in the residential area ahead, but I see a group of low-rise buildings in the lower right corner of my field of vision.  
C. I cannot see the swimming pool in the residential area ahead, but I see a small playground next to the high-rise building on the lower right side of my field of view.  
D. I cannot see the swimming pool in the residential area ahead, but I see a road intersection on the left side of my field of vision.  
E. I cannot see the swimming pool in the residential area ahead, but I see a group of high-rise residential buildings in the center of my field of view.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The initial position shows a view dominated by high-rise residential buildings in the center of the field of vision, with no swimming pool visible. Therefore, the most relevant object is the group of high-rise residential buildings.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 7)]
Option: E
Reason: From the initial position (0-7 seconds), the field of view is dominated by a group of high-rise residential buildings in the center. The question asks for the most relevant object if the swimming pool is not visible, and since the swimming pool is not visible, the high-rise buildings are the most prominent feature. The provided answer is correct.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The initial position shows a view dominated by high-rise residential buildings in the center of the field of vision, with no swimming pool visible. Therefore, the most relevant object is the group of high-rise residential buildings.
